actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department.

official_title: A bill relating to the tariff classifications of certain silicone resins and materials.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to include all forms of silicone in the term "synthetic plastics materials." Imposes a duty on silicone resins and materials. Provides, under certain conditions, for the deletion of the Least Developed Developing Country rate on such silicone resins and materials.

titles.title: A bill relating to the tariff classifications of certain silicone resins and materials.
